thread.title: New Red Priestess Spotted on 'Game of Thrones' Set
thread.title_full: New Red Priestess Spotted on 'Game of Thrones' Set

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: New Red Priestess Spotted on 'Game of Thrones' Set
text:
Comments Landing the role on the HBO series is possibly Melanie Liburd who recently posted on Instagram that she's joining the filming in Spain. 
" Game of Thrones " may have cast a new Red Priestess. A lady in red was recently spotted on the set in Peniscola, Spain, which has been transformed into Meereen, and a closer look at her may have revealed the mystery character and the actress who portrays it. According to Watchers on the Wall, the lady in red is a Red Priestess who helps Daenerys sway the Masters and former slaves in Meereen. In some new pictures , she's seen talking in front of people on the street. — DragonsandDirewolves (@Direwolf_Dragon) October 3, 2015 Still per the fan site, the actress who has landed the said role is Melanie Liburd. A week ago, she updated her Instagram with info that she's heading to Spain to join the production of the hit HBO series. Filming for the sixth season of "Game of Thrones" is currently underway in Spain and Belfast, Ireland. The new season is scheduled to premiere in spring 2016.
